Package index

Get Ratings

get_ratings()
Get crash test ratings for a specific vehicle
get_ratings_by_model()
Get ratings for all variants of a year/make/model

Rating Catalog Functions

list_rating_years()
List all available model years
list_rating_makes()
List all makes for a given year
list_rating_models()
List all models for a given year and make
list_rating_model_variants()
List crash-tested variants for a given year/make/model

Get Recalls

get_recalls()
Get recalls by year/make/model
get_recalls_by_campaign_number()
Get recalls by campaign number

Recall Catalog Functions

list_recall_years()
List all available recall years
list_recall_makes()
List all available recall makes
list_recall_models()
List all available recall models

Get Complaints

get_complaints()
Get complaints by year/make/model
get_complaints_by_odi_number()
Get complaints by ODI number

Complaints Catalog Functions

list_complaint_years()
List all available complaint years
list_complaint_makes()
List all available complaint makes
list_complaint_models()
List all available complaint models
